import React, { useState } from 'react' const AddUserForm = (props) => { const initialFormState = { Categoria: '', Nombre: '', Precio: '',stocked: ''} const [user, setUser] = useState(initialFormState) const handleInputChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }) } return (
{ event.preventDefault() if (!user.Categoria || !user.Nombre || !user.Precio || !user.stocked ) return props.addUser(user) setUser(initialFormState) }} >

) } export default AddUserForm
